snippet: Russia’s idea that President Bashar al-Assad give up gas weapons could be a way out of military action.
abstract: Editorial encourages Pres Obama and Sec of State John Kerry to pursue Kerry's originally-offhanded suggestion that Syria surrender its chemical weapons to avoid military strikes; notes growing number of countries, including Syria, have embraced this unexpected diplomatic solution and it should be explored, despite the chance it could be exploited by regime of Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s idea that President Bashar al-Assad give up gas weapons could be a way out of military action.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
